text: Israel Klabin (born 20 September 1926) is a Brazilian civil engineer, mathematician, environmentalist and politician. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. He was the second Mayor of Rio de Janeiro from 15 March 1979 to 3 June 1980. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian scientists Category:Civil engineers Category:Mathematicians Category:Brazilian environmentalists Category:Mayors of Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians
title: Israel Klabin
